                description = "Cat a specific key from ozone server")
          
          
            
                description = "Copies a specific Ozone key to standard output")
Should we consider a small copy buffer size like (4k) instead of default OZONE_SCM_CHUNK_SIZE_DEFAULT(4M) for better memory efficiency?
This will use 4KB buffer only if chunk size is not configured, which I don't think can happen.  I guess @xiaoyuyao's intention was to always use 4KB buffer, regardless of chunk size setting.
